message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40.  I believe this is fair considering the rate of inflation we are facing.
Alice, I think we can both do better than that. I'm willing to split it 60/40, but in my favor this time. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. How about 53/47? It's better for you than the last round, and it accounts for the fact that the money is losing value more quickly for me.
